definition.zh_def: 低於正常體溫的狀態或感覺，通常與寒冷的環境有關。
definition.en_def: Having a low temperature, especially when compared to the temperature of the human body; feeling chilly.
definition.example: I need to wear a jacket because it's really cold outside.
